Israel-Hamas war: Sadness for Kiwi family after premature Palestinian baby Sabreen Jouda dies https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/israel-hamas-war-sadness-for-kiwi-family-after-premature-palestinian-baby-sabreen-jouda-dies/72LLZDCGE5FOFNUKHQAFZEELIU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/israel-hamas-war-sadness-for-kiwi-family-after-premature-palestinian-baby-sabreen-jouda-dies/72LLZDCGE5FOFNUKHQAFZEELIU/ Baby Sabreen loses fight for survival after being cut from dead mother’s womb. Sat, 27 Apr 2024 05:27:30 +0000 Sabreen Jouda, who was delivered prematurely after her mother was killed in an Israeli strike along with her husband and daughter, has lost her fight for life aged 5 days. She's pictured in an incubator in the Emirati hospital in Rafah, southern Gaza Strip aged 1 day. AP Photo/Mohammad Jahjouh
Destiny Church member Ashara Kingi jailed for stealing $377,000 from her employer https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/destiny-church-member-ashara-kingi-jailed-for-stealing-377000-from-her-employer/NECY5JDQUFFTNAUVF6TGSSQ6GM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/destiny-church-member-ashara-kingi-jailed-for-stealing-377000-from-her-employer/NECY5JDQUFFTNAUVF6TGSSQ6GM/ Sandra Conchie'She was a good actor who portrayed herself as a good Christian woman.' Fri, 26 Apr 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Destiny Church member Ashara Jaymie Kingi, 33, was sentenced to two years and two months jail after stealing $377,167.92 from her employer Larry John O'Neill while employed part-time as his bookkeeper.

Child dies after crash in driveway in Karaka, Auckland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/child-dies-after-crash-on-driveway-in-karaka-auckland/WF7XGZ3K7VEU3DOU65RALJWLSU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/child-dies-after-crash-on-driveway-in-karaka-auckland/WF7XGZ3K7VEU3DOU65RALJWLSU/ A section of the road is closed and enquiries are underway. Sat, 27 Apr 2024 04:59:44 +0000 Police were notified of the crash at around 3:35pm involving a vehicle and a child on a driveway on Karaka Road.
